title: Defended download completely failed! Can't disable it! File damaged!
content: Almost 4-5 months I can't download anything with suspicious code inside (repack or keygen, or test compiled file, 4ex. from Github) cause FF defense blocks it every time even when it's disabled! And even when I manually allow to download this zipped file, I get an error message of damaged archive file format! FF crashes and damages my files!!! (Don't try to point on my other defense software - I don't use it and everything is disabled, and other browsers works good). This is very important bug for me, so I already think to change and migrate to Opera or another browser.
creator: MikeVaghur

title: Disable extensions from Toolbar / Containers for an extensions
content:
There are extensions that I am not using 99% of the time or use them at one website.

There a two options:

  • Make UX more friendly: add button to list an extensions with checklist to disable OR add "Disable extension" option inside menu between "Manage extension" and "Remove extension" (by right mouse click at extension icon at Toolbar.
  • Be cool if Mozilla Team will develop mechanism to switch between extension modes. As example I create my default exts mode (ublock, firefox notes, multi-account containers), but also time by time I save webpages by SingleFile extension, also I use proxy extensions so I create list for it. Lists may be as additional (default + proxy) as independent from scratch (proxy only).

Why? Privacy by isolation processes in the browser.
creator: FirefoxIsAwesome

title: Data Recovery
content:
I was using Firefox as my default browser and had data like bookmarks, add-ons for everyday use, etc. but after I reinstalled windows and installed Firefox again I forgot which email was link to my data as I had multiple emails logged in. Now I have tried 2-3 emails which didn't work in bringing my data back and I don't remember the password of my other emails, I can recover them by forgot password but I it says resetting password will clear history bookmarks, etc.| I can afford to loose history and saved passwords but is there a way I can get Firefox back to my configuration and add-ons, etc I was using previously?

PS: I do have windows.old file after windows installation-If it could help./

title: Tab sync doesn't work because of CreditCards?
content:
Hello, Firefox on Mac doesn't sync tabs because of the following problem:

Sync.Synchronizer DEBUG Updating enabled engines failed: Error: CreditCards is not initialized. Please restart if you flip the pref manually.(resource://autofill/FormAutofillStorageBase.jsm:2018:21) JS Stack trace: get@FormAutofillStorageBase.jsm:2018:21

Sync.ErrorHandler ERROR Sync encountered an error: Error: CreditCards is not initialized. Please restart if you flip the pref manually.(resource://autofill/FormAutofillStorageBase.jsm:2018:21) JS Stack trace: get@FormAutofillStorageBase.jsm:2018:21

Do you have an idea what's wrong here? FYI: I use a custom user.js file.

Thanks
